summary: Lloyd George is mentioned in a cable concerning SILENCE C and the KAPOK LCHARVEST operation in Mexico City. The cable also mentions Richard Walker and internal CIA staff. The documents do not provide any further information about Lloyd George's identity, role, or significance beyond their presence in this cable related to CIA operations in Mexico City. There is no indication of their involvement in the JFK assassination context within these documents.
significance: The documents do not provide any information to suggest Lloyd George has any significance in the JFK assassination context.
